body: Photo Gallery                    Flag Day 2014   17 Photos  Perry's Victory participated in Raise It Up, a Smithsonian Flag Day event in celebration of the 200th anniversary of the Star-Spangled Banner.           The Bicentennial of the Battle of Lake Erie   12 Photos  Images from the Bicentennial Commemoration of the Battle of Lake Erie          Perry's Victory and International Peace Memorial   12 Photos  Photos of Perry's Victory and International Peace Memorial on South Bass Island            Perry's Victory Cornerstone Centennial Celebration 2013   8 Photos  100th anniversary of the laying of the cornerstone of Perry's Victory and International Peace Memorial          Historic Weekend   5 Photos  Images from the annual Historic Weekend, held at Perry's Victory and International Peace Memorial on the anniversary of the Battle of Lake Erie.          Restoration Image Gallery 2010   10 Photos  Collection of construction images from Phase One of memorial restoration project            Historic Construction   5 Photos            Education   5 Photos  Living history and educational programs at Perry's Victory.
title: Perry's Victory & International Peace Memorial: Photo Gallery
